website_summaries.verdict: Keeps older children warm during early morning swim practice or extended swimming outings in cool water.
pros: For older children, tweens, and small teens
cons: Consider sizing down for shorter or slender children and ordering up for heavier or taller children

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit for kids to extend swimming season.
customer_reviews.text: On our second one, kids outgrew the first although it still had some life in it. They work great, kids still have good range of motion. Keeps the kids warm in cooler swimming. I will say that after a couple of years the old suit had a few worn spots on the bum where the color was starting to wear off from sitting, but these wetsuits are so much better than the kiddie ones that had before that were too thin and fell apart in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Poppies

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought a size 8 for my child and it initially looked too small. But once it went on, the suit fit perfectly. My kid usually swims in an outdoor pool year round in California. These pools are heated for lap swimmers, but would be too cold for kids who are learning to swim and splashing around in the early mornings, or late afternoons. The O'Neil wetsuit delivers the needed warmth to keep my child from turning blue in the pool! We plan on bringing it to the beach to wear too.
customer_reviews.author: LYJ

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: My 10 Year old boy is 46 inches tall and weighs 75lbs and this fits him extremely well. It has enough stretch that it will work for a kid 5-10lbs heavier or lighter or 2-4 inches shorter or taller. It's well constructed and my son is able to put it on and take it off by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Lokmom

customer_reviews.title: keeps my skinny kid warm. he is athletic and ...
customer_reviews.text: keeps my skinny kid warm. he is athletic and muscular but you can see his ribs, he has a flat stomach with a 6 pack. He is 7 1/2 on the taller side, but not the tallest at school. , about 64 lbs., size 8 pants and shorts fit perfectly on him, but he could squeeze into a 7 if he wanted to but they would be short on him. So I got the size 10 in the Wetsuit. It is not tight, but he likes it and it may last until he is 9.
customer_reviews.author: Chubb Family

customer_reviews.title: Received a women's sz. 6 and not a youth sz. 12
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this last year (June 2017) and only received it last week (October 2018). Had it sent to my sister's house in WA and then sent from BC, Canada (with other things) via the slow boat as we moved to the Philippines. O'Neill makes a great suit! That's why I chose this suit. The only problem here is that my son needs a sz. 12 youth and we received a women's sz. 6. It's too big overall and especially in the hips. Not sure what we can do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit for kids
customer_reviews.text: Although my daughter has not used it very often because she likes thicker wetsuits (she always surfs with full suits), i can tell that it is a great product. The arms and legs are not loose. My daughter is 9, so I ordered size 8 and it fits her perfectly, with room to grow. Will buy again in the future when we need bigger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My son takes swimming class every week he loves having this on it kept him warm and confident in the water, It fits him well and very comfortable good quality. It did have a little bit of the smell to but after using a few times, rinsing with soap and water it helped getting most of the smell out.
customer_reviews.author: AshZoeWill

customer_reviews.title: The were in the surf like fish for hours (with water temps in the 60s)
customer_reviews.text: I saved myself a week of complaints from my children about unseasonably chilly beach water temps. The were in the surf like fish for hours (with water temps in the 60s). Nicely-constructed and fits as indicated: use the larger of the sizes indicated by your child's height and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: They do not stink (as some of the reviews stated) and the fit is perfect for my 3 year old and my 8year old
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2-one for each of my children and they are loving them! We use them for cold days out on the lake and for cold days in swim classes! They do not stink (as some of the reviews stated) and the fit is perfect for my 3 year old and my 8year old. I ordered up a size to get more use out of them!
customer_reviews.author: Sparks mom

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit. Bought it for my 3 yo boy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great swimsuit. Bought it for my 3 yo boy and the fit is perfect. We've tried several swim suits before and they were always too loose which defeat the purpose of a suit because you need it to be tight. Otherwise, cold water enter the suit and it's not as good at keeping you warm. This one will do its job. This suit is 2mm thick so it may not be ideal for swimming but my 3 yo is not there yet so it's fine. It may also be a little warm for summer or tropical locations.
customer_reviews.author: Mapx

customer_reviews.title: Ran much smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: My son had outgrown his 12, so I ordered a 14... However, the 14 was so snug that he could barely pull it up over his legs. We ended up returning it and ordering to a men's small, which is a little too large across the chest, but fits overall. Product quality was excellent and I had no problem ordering a larger size - I'd just suggest "ordering up" rather than "down" or "to fit."
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Schubert

customer_reviews.title: True to size - keep child warm in cold water - flexible for swimming classes
customer_reviews.text: It fits as expected. Purchased size 8 for our slim child 4 months ago (he is now 51in tall). He wears slim fit clothing and these suit fits him well with room to grow. The suit keeps him warm in the pool and flexible for swimming classes.
customer_reviews.author: Monk Fan

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my son but now I want one too
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and fits perfectly. Its warm but not hot. Now my son can enjoy playing in the ocean without getting cold after a few minutes. I'm very happy with this purchase. It looks very well made. I might need to buy one for myself now I like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: This suit smells horrible and keeps on smelling after months of use. The out gassing has be worried particularly if the product contains ethylene thiourea and ends up growing breasts on my son. :) However it is warm, if it is determined to be safe and the product materials are posted I suppose I can just hang it in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen H. Buck

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! My 8 yo no longer complains about being cold in the lap pool for swim lessons. Size 4 fit perfectly. Hes 48 lb. 48 in. Wears size 7 regularl clothes. Zipper has extra long string and gets it on by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Doud

customer_reviews.title: he loved it. I'd probably give it 4
customer_reviews.text: Got this wetsuit for my 8 year old who gets cold in the water fast--he's a slim dude--and it really helped, he loved it. I'd probably give it 4.5 stars if I could only because the torso is short. He had to get a smaller size due to his slim stature, but the smaller size was cut for a younger and shorter kid. But it keeps him warm and happy in the pool pretty much indefinitely. so a win!
customer_reviews.author: M. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews, they are helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Fitted great. I found the reviews very helpful. I went with two sizes larger and it is aesthetically lose, leaving room for my grandson to use it one or two years. Great quality and very comfortable. I would need more stars to better rate this product. I got it when I needed it and it all went very well.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Bolivar

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son,"swimming lessons " Fit perfect , very good material we had it for 2 mo ths and no issues. Definitely worth the price .
customer_reviews.author: Susan Holguin

customer_reviews.title: good for skinny kids
customer_reviews.text: Excellent suit for winter swimming​ fits my skinny son perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Just what my grandson needed.
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for my grandson who absolutely loves it.I does provide a warmth factor if the water is cold but it was mainly purchase to keep very tiny jelly fish away that were getting under his swim trunks and rash guard shirt. Prevents a lot of stings and itching.
customer_reviews.author: Furngirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my youngest son. He is almost 3 and has not an ounce of fat on him. He is taking swim lessons at a local gym and, even though the water is ~ 78 degrees, he tends to cool down quite a bit within the first ten minutes or so. Because of this he had been stopping his lessons short even though he loves his instructor and the water. This suit is substantial and very well made. It has served its purpose well and we are very happy as is my son.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wetsuit for my son who had a really hard time with the cold water at the local pool. He used to hated the swimming lessons because the water was so cold he would start shivering right from the start. The problem was solved with this wetsuit. Not only it keeps him warm it also assists in swimming making it easier to float. Now I'm gonna look to buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Edward V.

customer_reviews.title: After trying to find a right size in adult women wetsuit, I found this.
customer_reviews.text: After trying to find a right size in adult women wetsuit, I found this. I am 5'3'' 100lbs, lots of adult women suit seems big to me so I tried size 14 of this one and it fit perfect. I am so thrilled to my diving training in this suit!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: ... O'Neil wet suits in the family and they are superior quality and fit for us
customer_reviews.text: We own several O'Neil wet suits in the family and they are superior quality and fit for us. This suit fit an average sized boy (in height and weight) 8 1/2 years old perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is perfect for my 4 year old. The seams are not in areas that would cause chafing (i.e. arm pit or between legs). The material is thick and warm but also very stretchy allowing my daughter to be active. She says it is comfortable. The only issue I have is with the neck. It is an odd fit and does rub at the velcro opening leaving some redness. Overall great suit.
customer_reviews.author: mama

customer_reviews.title: Great for chilly swim weather or even pools that are ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for chilly swim weather or even pools that are too cold. Rubs a bit in the neck at first but overall great product! We have owned a few brands and we do like the quality of O'Neil.
customer_reviews.author: GEOROCK

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my 5 year old. He no longer complains that he's cold in the pool. I'm happy I brought O'Neill wetsuit. Thanks to it he's able to stay the entire duration of the class.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These wetsuits a helpful for children who get cold easily while swimming
customer_reviews.text: These wetsuits a helpful for children who get cold easily while swimming. My daughter wears hers in our pool and for swimming lessons. She no longer complains about being too cold to swim. My daughter particularly loves the cord in the back which allows her to zip and unzip her wetsuit on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah122

customer_reviews.title: The fit was very good. Quality is good as well
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these (for my children, 9, 6, and 3). The fit was very good. Quality is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Roundle

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit for swim lessons
customer_reviews.text: Second one we've purchased (had to get a larger size after a year of wearing the first one). Perfect for swim lessons in a cold pool. High quality and keeps our daughter warm.
customer_reviews.author: R Jaffe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution. Most wetsuits for children are loose in the arms and legs so they are mostly ineffective. Not this one. My son is a thin 40 lbs and the size 4 is a little too big but with the neck, arm, and leg areas just snug enough to keep the water in he stays warm and can last hours in the water now. The quality of the construction appears to be very good.
customer_reviews.author: MBL

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is not too thick
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses daily at swim practice because the pool is so cold in the winter. I like that it is not too thick. She wears comfortably and can still complete the required movements without difficulty yet without getting too cold either :).
customer_reviews.author: Jed

customer_reviews.title: S
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart by the maker is wrong! I bought size 8 and it was too small for my child height (around 127 cm) It was supposed to fit 144 cm tall, but was too small. Go 2 size up when ordering from the chart.
customer_reviews.author: MINI

customer_reviews.title: We ordered two wetsuits (this one and Hyperflex) in the ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two wetsuits (this one and Hyperflex) in the same size. This one ran smaller and the neck was very tight. (My son is very slim) You should be aware if you are purchasing this suit and end up returning it - the shipping is charged to you for the return. I didn't notice this when I purchased the suit.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Fit well my 11 year old son. A bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit well my 11 year old son. A bit lose on the torso area, but he is rather thin. It did the trick on his trip to Marine Lab in the Keys :)
customer_reviews.author: Marco J DeObaldia

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pick if you need warmth and bouyancy
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year old wants to become a marine biologist and was looking forward to snorkling. Last year he could only last in the water for 5 minutes because he didn't have an ounce of body fat to keep him warm. This year we got the O'Neill Wetsuit and it solved the problem. Most other suits are for sun protection but this one focuses on warmth and buoyancy. It is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Larson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, every time!
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a lot of money, but if you have a skinny kid who hates swimming because they turn blue, don't skimp. My son became a fish wearing this thing. you can also hand it down for years. Incredibly well made. We're on our second one, and it really is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Good, but the very strong solvent smell could be a showstopper for many
customer_reviews.text: If it weren't for the stinky volatile solvent smell which still hasn't gone away after more than 2 months, I would rate it 5 stars. We literally have to hang this outside the house to dry because the smell is so pungent. Functionally, it is awesome and keeps our 5 year old warmer than most other wetsuits we've tried and we've tried several because we live in Hawaii. The build quality is very good too. But don't overlook the smell. We've bought about 6 wetsuits of the years and none of even come close to this one in terms of that volatile solvent smell.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tan

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this purchase for my son
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase for my son. He's a bit on the skinny side and this fits him perfect. He loves wearing it. Saves on sunscreen battles too!
customer_reviews.author: JFP

customer_reviews.title: excellent suit
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality youth suit. Purchased one for a girl clearly a size 6 according to the chart but it was definitely too small and had to be exchanged for an 8. The price was typical for items of similar size and quality. I purchased an adult suit of similar quality at Sams Club for much less but they didn't have any in this size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was too small on my shorter thicker kid despite following size chart as best I could
customer_reviews.text: Order up a size if your kid is short and stout. This was too small on my shorter thicker kid despite following size chart as best I could. But on my perfectly proportioned kid it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Katie D

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this wetsuit for kids. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wetsuit for my grandson. It fits him perfectly and keeps him warm in the water. I recommend it highly. Great quality and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alert consumer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic suits. They keep the kids warm
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic suits. They keep the kids warm. They fit well, dry off quickly, stay well formed through storage. The long string at the back allows each child to zip and unzip themselves. They last ore than one season. They are very well made. 5 Stars..
customer_reviews.author: North Shore

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this as a gift for my daughter. ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my daughter. She loves the fit and subtle styling. The price and quality go hand in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really love this, it helps my son warm during his swimming lessons.
customer_reviews.author: myzoya

customer_reviews.title: Fit was as expected. Do the measurements and you ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit was as expected. Do the measurements and you will be okay.
customer_reviews.author: DrJ

customer_reviews.title: Accurate sizing and works great for the kids!  Will buy another one when daughter outgrows this one.
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well. Keeps my daughter warm in the cooler pools and during the winter swim sessions. The size chart was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wu, Orange County, CA Realtor

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of the size
customer_reviews.text: According to the size chart pictured we needed a size 6 for my son. He is 4'1" and with all the measurements he was definitely a 6. When we got the wetsuit it way too small. The length being the worst. We ordered a size 8 and it fits better. The height measurements for this are way off. My son is 7 years old, 4'1" and 60 lbs. He looks thin but he is solid so it's hard to go by weight for stuff with him. The suit seems very well made and we are very happy with it. It has extra room around his waist though but it doesn't bother him.
customer_reviews.author: JKDZ

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and provides warmth
customer_reviews.text: helps my kids tolerate the water in their indoor winter swimming class. bothe my kids use these and they are comfortable, allowing them to swim their laps
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality wet suit for my slender 11 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality wet suit for my slender 11 year old daughter. Makes ocean swimming in the winter in Southwest FL possible.
customer_reviews.author: KALA

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 6yo daughter. She is 48lbs, 44.5 inches tall.
customer_reviews.author: RICKSTER

customer_reviews.title: Good quality suit for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son and it fit well and is a nice quality. Hopefully it will hold up over time to hand down to his younger brother.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 7 year old son. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old son. He is 50" tall and weighs 49lbs. I ordered the size 4. It fit perfect. We use it at the beach every weekend. Before the wetsuit he could last about 15minutes before his lips turned blue and he began shivering. Now he can go hours at a time. Love the quality and fit!
customer_reviews.author: PKCA

customer_reviews.title: Should be 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this. Have two for our kids and they work really well. Only minor complaint is the neck is a little stiff and the kids complain that they feel choked every time they put them on. Though the complaining stops once they are in the water. Would definitely recommend for swim lessons when the water or season is colder.
customer_reviews.author: JKMan

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my 8 yr old who is tall and it fit well. I got a size 10. we use it for pool swimming lessons
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Sizing too small
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was way too small. I wish they could be more accurate, now I have to waste time to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer 21

customer_reviews.title: Good Decision and nice suit
customer_reviews.text: We used measurements of 84lbs. and 56" and almost went with a size 10. I'm glad we went with a size 12 instead. There will be some room to grow but not as much as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: CReview

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 5 yr old perfectly and kept him warm during swim lessons. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Christine H

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits Great. Bought size 12 for my 10 year old who is 4'8" and 78 lbs. Good quality. Use for Southern Cal beaches and Hawaii snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: IrishGirl

customer_reviews.title: This is fine for a wider 8 year old than my own
customer_reviews.text: This is fine for a wider 8 year old than my own . There was actually more space in the belly area than needed, no streamline
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The size from the O'Neill website was accurate and the ...
customer_reviews.text: The size from the O'Neill website was accurate and the suit kept my daughter warm enough splashing in 65F water. Only drawback was the high neckline which led to minor chafing.
customer_reviews.author: Jorg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old is tall (95%) - 10 to short - 12 fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ValhallaMom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and very warm. worked Great for snorkeling in Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Son, he loves it. great product....thanks the fast shipping and great suit that he is going to enjoy for this summer anyway...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality but price is little too high for kids.
customer_reviews.author: uni kim

customer_reviews.title: Kept my daughter warm
customer_reviews.text: We have struggled to keep my daughter in the pool when it is cold. When wearing this my daughter stays in the whole time. And, even better, she likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Beckster

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: My son is very slim (8 years old but less than 50 lbs). He does not like swimming because he feels cold in the water. We purchased O'Neill Wetsuits after reading the reviews. My son likes it. We purchased size #6 for him.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great fit daughter really likes the extra warmth for surfing and good price
customer_reviews.author: brandt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This suit has allowed my son to swim without turning blue. We were able to enjoy the day at the water park.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Popp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fit great works great and was delivered right on time thank you Amazon another happy boggie boarder 😎
customer_reviews.author: Ray Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great Price / Quality
customer_reviews.text: Use heights for measurements suit looked so small when opened package but fit correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Uhland

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this wet suit. Works well and very durable. Easy to put on and take off. It's probably a bit too big but he will grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: James S. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: nicely made, does a great job of keeping you ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, nicely made, does a great job of keeping you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E Smith

customer_reviews.title: Used for indoor pool that is relatively cold - keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for indoor pool that is relatively cold - keeps kid warm enough. In learning to swim, it is a bit restricting in full arm stretch/reach.
customer_reviews.author: Nkem

customer_reviews.title: Made son's groin area hurt
customer_reviews.text: He said it fit fine but he hated how much it bunched up in his groin. Not sure if it is him or the suit. Quick service
customer_reviews.author: Cenacooks

customer_reviews.title: Sizing off
customer_reviews.text: I order my son, who just turned 11, the size 12 based on the reviews I read that they fit big. Unfortunately it just fits him now and probably won't in the summer. Now I'm trying to sell it myself so I don't have to pay to ship it back. Disappointing. The suit it's self seems good quality.
customer_reviews.author: duncandame

customer_reviews.title: This suit is awsome
customer_reviews.text: I hated watching my 5yr. old shivering during his swim class. I searched and read the reviews before choosing this wetsuit for him. This suit is made of quality materials. Seems are very strong. It looks and feels expensive. The size 6 fits his 50 pound frame like a glove. He loves that It keeps him warm, and allows him to swims with out any restrictions. I will be ordering a size 8 soon to make sure it's available when he out grows this one. I highly recommend this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: As good as an adult suit
customer_reviews.text: My girls love these wetsuits. It extends boating season by about a month so that makes them worth it to me! It seems like this is every bit as good as an adult suit
customer_reviews.author: NEOhioCPA

customer_reviews.title: Great wet suit!
customer_reviews.text: Our son wears this when he goes swimming at the community pool that is always too cold for kids. He loves it and it keeps him warm. It's not too hard for him to get off and on even when wet. The zipper on the back has a long pull string and that allows him to do it all on his own. We will be buying him another since he is almost grown out of it already. It's still in great condition too and his three little sisters can use it as well. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jaminite

customer_reviews.title: Best by far
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought two as they are great wetsuits. I first bought a size 6 for my 6 yr old and fits perfectly even 6 months on now so it made perfect sense to buy the size 4 for my 4 yr old boy too. Both boys love them and in their words they describe as "comfy"! Job done.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price, looks nice, held up well for a SoCal summer!!!
customer_reviews.author: tom b

customer_reviews.title: Right fit!
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly to my son...looks very nice and feels really good quality. The shipment and process was amazing and fast. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: omar cancel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit my grand daughter perfectly. She loves it. Received it very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: They are a nice fitting lighter weight wetsuits
customer_reviews.text: They are a nice fitting lighter weight wetsuits. Great for lakes to add warmth and buoyancy. The kids don't get fatigued as fast.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: We purchased two of these for our sons who are ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these for our sons who are 10 and 8. We purchase size 10 for both (our 8yo is tall), but the size 10 was way too short in the torso. So, we went with the size 12 for both and these fit perfectly. Given how quickly our boys are growing I'm not sure how much use we'll really get out of them, but for now they help to take the chill out of the winter Florida beach days.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wrede

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Summer
customer_reviews.text: Probably more like a size 10 than a 12, other than that, great wetsuit for kids. But definitely on the smaller side, would recommend ordering a size up.
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. Fits well and works well. Great buy for the money. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S. Mazurkie

customer_reviews.title: Great DeaL!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is size 10/12 and we got size 12. While it fits well I wish we had bought the size 14 to beable to use it maybe one more year before she grows out of it. Over all great deal nice suit.
customer_reviews.author: Leif Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Our grandsons love these suits. They are warm and comfortable in the water. Great for water skiing , tubing and just being in and out of the lakeon cooler days.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia K. Bolger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: son loves it and feels warm when at swim lessons
customer_reviews.author: Kelly White

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! It fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! It fit like a glove. My son is 9 but is very slim so size 6 was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: E.D.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but runs small.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 4 for my son based on the web site size chart. It was way too short, so we had to exchange for a size 6 (O'Neill doesn't offer a size 5.) The 6 is the appropriate length with room for growth. The material is quite sturdy and keeps my son warm in the cold waters of our local pool.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great for swim practice
customer_reviews.text: Definitely keeps my very slender 7yo warm in the water. We had an unusually cold start to the summer swim season where all practice and meets are outside. My daughter has very little body fat so she shivered her way through practices but once we got this suit she was fine. She willing got in the water and had no issues with movement during practices.
customer_reviews.author: Clair K.

customer_reviews.title: Best $$ ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this suit!! It keeps me warm swimming laps every morning in the indoor pool. It's a perfect fit too!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle H.

customer_reviews.title: It's so... So
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's pretty good. The only problems are that it gets loose over time and a little restricted. I have it for 2 months only.
customer_reviews.author: Loc Tran

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my kid warm
customer_reviews.text: If my son is in the water for a long time he wears this and it really works. Easy up keep.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Justin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product, now my 7years old son no longer shiver in his Sunday swimming lesson.no more blue lips
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy! But ran 2 sizes small sent the 1st one back.
customer_reviews.author: B Champ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The package came a bit late but it was worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob

customer_reviews.title: For my 10yr old
customer_reviews.text: fits great his is around 70 lbs, made great and thick too. I do think it wil last also the chest portion is rubbery so he can grip to the boogie board better and wait to got to the beach! no more sand rash!
customer_reviews.author: FOF

product_meta.title: O'Neill Youth Reactor 2mm Back Zip Spring Wetsuit
product_meta.description: O'Neill Reactor Youth Springsuit Wetsuit 2mm The 2mm O'Neill REACTOR shorty springsuit gets you into a quality suit at a great price! 30% of the suit (shoulders and sleeves) are made of superstretch neoprene so it won't restrict your upper body range of m
feature_bullets: Performance Fit - This garment is intended to fit skin tight
